answers.answer: I'm so very sorry.  At present we don't really have a way to regrow brain or spinal cord cells.  Stem cell therapy is aimed in that direction but results are coming along fairly slowly.  It is something that we look forward hopefully for the future.  For now, a very good occupational therapist may be able to help.  THere are some computer programs available now to try to help stroke victims better learn to use their remaining vision.MJK MD
